job_tasks.phrase: you will play a crucial role in enhancing collaborations across the entire healthcare chain. A key aspect of this is system integration.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core function of integrating different systems to improve workflow, which falls under traditional software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Our application integrates with client and supplier systems, automating a significant portion of manual administrative processes.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the integration of the application with external systems and the automation of processes, a key software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: We connect with planning and HR systems, electronic client records (ECD), systems of external staffing suppliers, and Identity & Access Management (IAM) packages.
job_tasks.justification: This details the specific systems the application needs to integrate with, reinforcing the software integration aspect of the role.

job_tasks.phrase: Using algorithms, we can automatically identify the most suitable healthcare provider, saving repetitive work and enabling organizations to make better decisions and optimize processes.
job_tasks.justification: This mentions the use of 'algorithms' to identify suitable providers and optimize processes, which aligns with the development of predictive or decision-support models, a core ML task.

job_tasks.phrase: You will primarily work on the backend of the application.
job_tasks.justification: This specifies the primary area of software development, indicating a focus on backend systems.

job_tasks.phrase: your focus will be on restructuring the architecture and domain model, where events will play a central role.
job_tasks.justification: Restructuring architecture and domain models are fundamental software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: the focus will shift to the outer layers of the application, which includes handling complex integrations with new external systems such as planning, HR, and financial tools, as well as enhancing the interface with the internal GraphQL API.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions handling complex integrations with external systems and enhancing APIs, which are core software development and integration activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Our build pipelines with unit tests run automatically, allowing us to release multiple times a day through CI/CD.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the use of CI/CD pipelines and automated testing, which falls under operations and MLOps practices for software deployment.

soft_skills.phrase: We review each other's pull requests and occasionally collaborate in pair-programming sessions.
soft_skills.justification: Reviewing pull requests and pair programming are direct examples of collaboration and knowledge sharing among developers.

soft_skills.phrase: you will play a crucial role in enhancing collaborations across the entire healthcare chain.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates understanding the business context (healthcare chain) and aligning technical work to improve collaborations, fitting business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: enabling organizations to make better decisions and optimize processes.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the goal of using technology to improve business decisions and processes, demonstrating business understanding.
Explicitly stating the value of lifelong learning points to a focus on continuous learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: you can dedicate 10% of your time to side projects focused on innovation and personal growth.
soft_skills.justification: Allocating time for personal growth and innovation projects directly supports the category of learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Additionally, you'll mentor team members to become better developers.
soft_skills.justification: Mentoring team members is a clear indicator of collaboration and knowledge sharing.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks such as system integration, backend development, architecture restructuring, and API enhancement. While it mentions the use of 'algorithms' for identifying healthcare providers and optimizing processes, this is presented as a feature within the application rather than a deep focus on model development or GenAI specifics. The core responsibilities and technologies (TypeScript, Node.js, React, GraphQL, PostgreSQL, GCP) are all standard software engineering tools. There is no mention of LLMs, prompt engineering, RAG, or specific GenAI frameworks. Therefore, the role is classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer because it involves integrating AI/ML features (algorithms) into a software product, but the primary focus remains on software engineering.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about its focus on backend software development, system integration, and the technologies used. The mention of 'algorithms' is the only AI-related aspect, and it's framed within the context of enhancing existing application functionality rather than core AI/ML research or GenAI development. This clarity allows for a confident classification.
